function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global pandemic infectious disease","Impact":"High risk of widespread illness, death, and economic disruption","Mitigation":"Effective public health measures, vaccination, and disease management protocols","Technologies":"IoT, sensors, big data analytics, AI, ML/DL, blockchain, AR/VR, robotics, and drones","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and essential workers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, and healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Proliferation of IoT and sensors in healthcare institutes","Impact":"Potential privacy and security breaches of sensitive healthcare data","Mitigation":"Implement strong encryption and cybersecurity measures, adhere to data protection regulations, and conduct regular security audits","Technologies":"Blockchain, encryption, cybersecurity, and data protection protocols","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, and data security professionals","Owner":"Healthcare organizations and IT security teams"},{"Description":"Use of robots and drones in high-risk environments","Impact":"Safety concerns, potential accidents, and public distrust","Mitigation":"Strict safety protocols, regular maintenance and inspections, public education on safety measures","Technologies":"Sensors, AI, robotics, and drone technology","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, and the general public","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology companies, and regulatory agencies"}]}
